data.eml:eml: Molecular and morphological assessment of Varanus pilbarensis (Squamata: Varanidae), with a description of a new species from the southern Pilbara, Western Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maryan, Brad, Oliver, Paul M., Fitch, Alison J., O’Connell, Morgan (2014): Molecular and morphological assessment of Varanus pilbarensis (Squamata: Varanidae), with a description of a new species from the southern Pilbara, Western Australia. Zootaxa 3768 (2): 139-158, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3768.2.3
